plugins.name: Select Matching Layers
plugins.description:
Select Matching Layers helps you quickly find and select layers that match your selected ones — based on either the layer name or (for text layers) their actual content.


– Matches text layers by both name and text content

– Restricts search to the nearest shared parent (component, frame, or group)

plugins.name: SDS App Tokens Export
plugins.description:
The plugin exports colour variables as tokens for iOs and Android using a predefined format.


The plugin assumes that there are Core and Semantic collections of variables, and also checks if a variable refers to a variable from another library.


For example, the core collection contains variables like Blue/0, Pink/100, which are given a hex colour.


Semantic collection contains aliased variables of the form Brand/Primary: Pink/100. If a variable does not contain an alias reference, it is converted as a core token.


Using

The plugin gives you a choice of collection, Mode and colour scheme, which is contained in the first level of naming in Semantic collections.


Outputs

  1. for Core iOS: public static let Blue0 = Color(hex: "FFFFFFFFFFFFF")
  2. for Core Android: val Blue0: Color = Color(colour: 0xFFFFFFFFFF)
  3. for Semantic iOS: BrandTextPrimary: Color.DSColorPalette.Pink900
  4. for Semantic Android: BrandTextPrimary = DSCorePalette.Pink900
plugins.tagline: Export variables for mobile

138220.name: SDS App Tokens Export
138220.description:
The plugin exports colour variables as tokens for iOs and Android using a predefined format.


The plugin assumes that there are Core and Semantic collections of variables, and also checks if a variable refers to a variable from another library.


For example, the core collection contains variables like Blue/0, Pink/100, which are given a hex colour.


Semantic collection contains aliased variables of the form Brand/Primary: Pink/100. If a variable does not contain an alias reference, it is converted as a core token.


Using

The plugin gives you a choice of collection, Mode and colour scheme, which is contained in the first level of naming in Semantic collections.


Outputs

  1. for Core iOS: public static let Blue0 = Color(hex: "FFFFFFFFFFFFF")
  2. for Core Android: val Blue0: Color = Color(colour: 0xFFFFFFFFFF)
  3. for Semantic iOS: BrandTextPrimary: Color.DSColorPalette.Pink900
  4. for Semantic Android: BrandTextPrimary = DSCorePalette.Pink900
138220.release_notes: Small adjustments to the output for iOS. Variables are output in lower case.

plugins.name: Size Snap
plugins.description: Size Snap instantly aligns your designs to a consistent grid by rounding the width, height, stroke width, corner radius, spacing and padding of any selected layers—and their children—to a chosen multiple. Whether you pick one of the built-in presets (8, 16, 24, etc.) or enter your own custom value, Size Snap ensures every element snaps to clean, pixel-perfect dimensions.

plugins.name: Dialekt
plugins.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
plugins.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

136509.name: Dialekt
136509.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
136509.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

plugins.name: Frame Select Helper
plugins.description:
Supports repeatedly selecting the same group of frames by adding a mark (frame name suffix) to the selected frames.


If you copy and paste the selected frames from this tool onto another page, you can export only the targeted frames to a single PDF file by clicking “File” -> “Export frames to PDF”!


選択したフレームにマーク（フレーム名の接尾辞）を付けて、繰り返し同じフレーム群を選択することをサポートします。

このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます。


使い方

初回：選択対象にしたいフレームをマークする


Figmaのフレーム名に`--sfh-target`を付与する

これは手動で、またはフレームを選択した状態でプラグインを起動して"選択フレームを対象にマーク"を押すことで行う


2回目以降：フレームを一括選択する

  1. プラグインを起動する
  2. "すべて選択・解除"を押すと、マークしたフレームがすべて選択される


このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます
plugins.tagline: Selection helper for those who want to repeatedly select the same frame for PDF export, etc.

Figmaのフレーム名に`--sfh-target`を付与する

これは手動で、またはフレームを選択した状態でプラグインを起動して"選択フレームを対象にマーク"を押すことで行う


2回目以降：フレームを一括選択する

このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます
137113.release_notes: Fixed incorrect click area on checklist items by adding missing labels.
137113.tagline: Selection helper for those who want to repeatedly select the same frame for PDF export, etc.

plugins.name: Update Human Design Panel
plugins.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps in Figma.

It retrieves JSON data from an external endpoint and populates predefined fields in a frame named INPUT_PANEL.

To function properly, the file must include that frame and the relevant text layers.

This plugin is intended for use within a specific workflow, but may be adapted for similar use cases.
plugins.tagline: Automatically fill a data panel in your Figma file from a remote JSON source.

137360.name: Update Human Design Panel
137360.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps in Figma.

It retrieves JSON data from an external endpoint and populates predefined fields in a frame named INPUT_PANEL.

To function properly, the file must include that frame and the relevant text layers.

This plugin is intended for use within a specific workflow, but may be adapted for similar use cases.
137360.release_notes:
PANEL UPDATER – Version 1.1
Release Notes

Improved security: now uses dynamic token authentication from the Figma panel to validate all server communications.

Enhanced error handling and status reporting to external services.

Minor adjustments for stability and performance.
137360.tagline: Automatically fill a data panel in your Figma file from a remote JSON source.

plugins.name: KColor.co
plugins.description:
KColor.co – The Free Smartest Color Tool for Designers

Create or get inspired with beautiful, accessible color palettes – all inside Figma. KColor.co brings essential tools into one sleek plugin:


Palette Generator: Instantly generate harmonious color sets in multiple modes (shades, tints, gradients, monochrome or Tailwind).


Contrast Checker: Test color combinations against WCAG 3 (APCA) standards to ensure readability and accessibility.


Color Blindness Simulator: See how your designs appear to users with different types of color blindness.


Export palettes to styles, variables or other formats.


Whether you are whipping up a fresh design or polishing the final pixels, KColor.co helps you work faster, smarter, and with accessibility baked in.


Find out more about how you can get the best out of this plugin.
plugins.tagline: The Free Smartest Color Tool for Designers

plugins.name: 文案提取与替换 Text Extractor & Replacer
plugins.description:
介绍

文案提取与替换是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，可快速提取选中元素中的文本，并支持批量修改与一键替换，适用于多语言版本设计、内容本地化与运营迭代场景。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中节点中的全部文本内容
  2. 自动合并重复文案并展示唯一列表
  3. 可逐条输入替换文案
  4. 支持一键替换全部或单条替换
  5. 支持复制原文案、一键恢复初始值
  6. 替换后自动更新当前原文显示


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个页面元素
  2. 点击【📋 提取选中文案】，展示全部原文案
  3. 输入对应的替换内容
  4. 点击【替换】按钮应用更改（可单条或全部替换）
  5. 点击【复制】获取原文，或点击【恢复】重填初始内容


注意事项

  1. 插件执行替换前需加载原文字体（已自动处理）
  2. 替换仅影响文本内容，不修改字体样式
  3. 替换基于精确匹配，请确保输入一致
  4. 请在提取前确保已选中有效节点


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elements—ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click 📋 Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quickly extract and replace text in bulk with ease

Tutorial

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=swYpvTmmorg


1.Scan a component instance

2.Create a snapshot of its properties

3.Paste snapshot properties into other instances of the same component


Works well with nested components, enabling property injection deep into component structures.


All captured properties are stored as an editable JSON structure.

plugins.name: SVGinify
plugins.description:
Convert SVG's in single files or Symbol Sprite.

This plugin will suit you if you use icons in your project as SVG Sprite using <use> tag.

Automatically cleans SVG from unnecessary attributes.


How to use:

You must select Component Variants with your icons.

Component variants must have the following properties:

  1. name - string
  2. stroke - Off / On


Component Variants must have no errors.
plugins.tagline: Convert SVG's in single files or Symbol Sprite

plugins.name: Layer Name To Text
plugins.description:
Instantly Add Layer Name Tags Beside Your Components

Tired of manually labeling component layers for documentation, presentations, or handoff?

Layer Name Labels is a simple yet powerful plugin that automates this process for you.


✅ What It Does

Layer Name Labels scans your selected component or frame and reads the names of visible layers. It then adds a text label next to each layer, mirroring its layer name—perfect for documentation, audits, teaching materials, or internal reviews.


💡 Why You'll Love It

⚡ One-click operation – Just select your components or frames and run the plugin.


🧠 Smart placement – Labels appear right next to each target layer.


✨ Non-destructive – Original design stays untouched. Labels are added as separate text layers.


🧩 Works with nested components – Recursively finds and labels layers inside complex structures.


🛠️ Perfect for:

Developer handoffs

Design system documentation

Training materials

Accessibility audits


🛠️ How It Works

Select any frame, group, or group of components.

Run the plugin.

Instantly see text layers added beside each target with its layer name.
plugins.tagline: Create names for countless layers in seconds

plugins.name: 图表库 Chart Master
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.


Features Introduction

•Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

•Automatically apply layout settings and styles to frames.

•Supports multiple language interfaces (English, Chinese, etc.).

•Real-time error notifications and fallbacks for seamless user experience.


How to Use

1.Open the Figma plugin and choose your desired design frame.

2.Click the insert button to add the frame to your design.

3.Customize the frame as needed—styles and layouts are already applied.

4.Switch languages via the plugin settings if required.


Notes

•Ensure all necessary fonts are installed to avoid fallback issues.

•If errors occur, check the console for detailed messages.

•Language settings can be changed anytime through the plugin interface.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件让设计师可以轻松地在项目中插入预定义的设计框架。通过简化应用一致的样式、布局和内容的过程，插件提高了生产力和设计一致性。


功能说明

•一键插入预定义的设计框架。

•自动应用框架的布局设置和样式。

•支持多语言界面（英语、中文等）。

•实时错误通知和回退功能，确保无缝用户体验。


使用方法

1.打开 Figma 插件，选择您需要的设计框架。

2.点击插入按钮，将框架添加到您的设计中。

3.根据需要自定义框架—样式和布局已自动应用。

4.如果需要，通过插件设置切换语言。


注意事项

•确保已安装所有必要的字体，以避免回退问题。

•如果发生错误，请检查控制台获取详细信息。

•可以随时通过插件界面更改语言设置。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Insert and Style Design Frames with a Click

plugins.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin helps you evaluate the contrast ratio between text and background colors in your design frames, ensuring they meet WCAG accessibility standards. Perfect for designers aiming to improve readability and accessibility.


Function Introduction

•Check text-background contrast ratio within selected frames.

•Evaluate contrast according to WCAG standards (AAA, AA, A, Fail).

•Visualize contrast results and interact with your design directly.

•Automatic identification and highlighting of areas needing improvement.


Usage

1.Select a frame in your Figma file.

2.Run the plugin and click “Check Contrast.”

3.Review the results, which are sorted by contrast ratio.

4.Click on any result to highlight and improve specific text elements.


Notes

•Ensure text layers are properly named for better result identification.

•The plugin currently supports checking text against solid color backgrounds only.

•For best results, use the plugin on well-structured design frames.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件帮助您评估设计画板中文本与背景颜色之间的对比度，以确保其符合 WCAG 无障碍设计标准。非常适合希望提升可读性和无障碍性的设计师。


功能说明

•检查选定画板中文本与背景的对比度。

•根据 WCAG 标准评估对比度（AAA、AA、A、Fail）。

•可视化对比度结果并直接与设计交互。

•自动识别和突出显示需要改进的区域。


使用方法

1.在 Figma 文件中选择一个画板。

2.运行插件并点击“检查对比度”。

3.查看按对比度排序的结果。

4.点击任一结果以突出并改进特定的文本元素。


注意事项

•确保文本图层正确命名，以便更好地识别结果。

•插件目前仅支持检查与纯色背景的文本对比。

•为获得最佳效果，请在结构良好的设计画板上使用插件。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quickly check and improve contrast ratios in Figma frames with one click.

plugins.name: Token Exporter
plugins.description:
Token Exporter


Transform your design system workflow with Token Exporter, the essential bridge between design and development. Automate the conversion of your Figma color variables into production-ready code for six major platforms, eliminating manual token conversion and ensuring pixel-perfect consistency across your entire product ecosystem.


Whether you're building for iOS, Android, Flutter, the modern web, or using cutting-edge frameworks like Tailwind CSS, Token Exporter streamlines your handoff process by generating clean, platform-specific code that developers can integrate directly into their projects.


--------------------------------------------------


🚀Key Features


One-Click Multi-Platform Export

Save hours of manual work by exporting multiple color collections to six formats simultaneously. Eliminate human error and ensure your carefully crafted design system remains perfectly consistent in code.


A Zero-Config Alternative to Style Dictionary

Get the power of a token transformation pipeline without the complex setup. Unlike build tools like Style Dictionary that require developer configuration, Token Exporter works instantly from within the Figma UI, empowering designers and developers to move faster.


Intelligent Variable Handling

The plugin automatically detects your variables and converts their names to platform-appropriate formats (e.g., Primary/Blue becomes primaryBlue). It fully supports the nested structures you create in Figma, maintaining your organization.


Powerful & Built for Scale

Process hundreds of variables across multiple collections in seconds. The batch processing power is optimized for performance, even in the largest design files.



📱 Supported Export Formats


Swift | iOS Development

public extension UIColor {
static let primaryBlue = UIColor(red: 0.067, green: 0.533, blue: 0.933, alpha: 1.0)
static let secondaryGreen = UIColor(red: 0.133, green: 0.733, blue: 0.467, alpha: 1.0)
}



Android | XML

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>
<color name="primary_blue">#1188EE</color>
<color name="secondary_green">#22BB77</color>
</resources>


Flutter | Dart

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class AppColors {
AppColors._();

static const Color primaryBlue = Color(0xFF1188EE);
static const Color secondaryGreen = Color(0xFF22BB77);
}


CSS | Custom properties

:root {
--color-primary-blue: #1188EE;
--color-secondary-green: #22BB77;
}


JSON | Universal

{
"colors": {
"primary": {
"blue": "#1188EE"
},
"secondary": {
"green": "#22BB77"
}
}
}


Tailwind | CSS (JavaScript) ✨New!

module.exports = {
theme: {
extend: {
colors: {
'primary': {
'blue': '#1188EE'
},
'secondary': {
'green': '#22BB77'
}
}
}
}
}



How to Use


  1. Organize Your Variables: Ensure your color variables are organized in Figma variable collections.
  2. Launch the Plugin: Open Token Exporter. It will automatically detect and display your collections that contain colors.
  3. Select Collections: Choose which color collections you want to export.
  4. Choose Formats: Select one or more export formats.
  5. Download Your Tokens: Click "Download" to get your perfectly formatted color token files.



--------------------------------------------------


Support & Feedback

Having issues or suggestions for improvement?

We'd love to hear from you!


❖ Send me an email

❖ Visit my Website

❖ Connect on LinkedIn



--------------------------------------------------


🔮 Future Updates

This is just the beginning! We are actively working on expanding Token Exporter to support more variable types.


Have a feature you'd love to see? Send me an email and let me know!
plugins.tagline: Export Figma variables to code for any platform.

plugins.name: ClientSim AI
plugins.description: ClientSim AI is a smart Figma plugin built for designers who want to practice and improve client communication, design decision explanation, and UX quality. Instead of exporting frames as images, the plugin reads your selected frame’s design structure — including layout, content, colors, and visual properties — and simulates a conversation with a virtual client.
plugins.tagline: Simulate client conversations and receive design feedback with AI-powered UX evaluations in Figma

140261.name: ClientSim AI
140261.description: ClientSim AI is a smart Figma plugin built for designers who want to practice and improve client communication, design decision explanation, and UX quality. Instead of exporting frames as images, the plugin reads your selected frame’s design structure — including layout, content, colors, and visual properties — and simulates a conversation with a virtual client.
140261.release_notes:
ClientSim AI is now live in its initial development phase! 🎉

This first version introduces core functionality including:

✨ AI-simulated client conversations based on your design

🔍 Heuristic evaluation using design properties (no image rendering)

📋 Support for client tone, persona, and feedback scoring

🧠 Fully text-based design analysis (no Vision API used)

⚠️ Note: This is an early release. For optimal performance:

Use smaller UI designs or individual sections for feedback

Avoid running on full homepages or complex multi-layered designs — token limits may result in errors

We’re working on optimizations for large-scale designs, token handling, and performance upgrades in the next version.
140261.tagline: Simulate client conversations and receive design feedback with AI-powered UX evaluations in Figma

plugins.name: Got a Date – Calendar Alerts
plugins.description:
Got a Date helps you stay on top of your schedule without leaving Figma.

Connect your Google Calendar and instantly see your upcoming events in the plugin’s sidebar.

Perfect for designers who want to stay focused and never miss a meeting.


🟢 Easy Google Calendar integration

🔔 View events directly inside Figma

🎯 Stay productive and organized while you work


This first version supports read-only access to your calendar. Alarm preferences and other features coming soon!
plugins.tagline: Got a Date connects to your Google Calendar and shows your upcoming events right inside Figma.

plugins.name: Image Copy-Paster
plugins.description:
Sync Image and Layer Names with this Plugin


When you're working with images in Figma, it's helpful for the layer name to match the original image file name. This makes it easy to confirm you're using the correct image at a glance. However, Figma's standard "Copy properties" and "Paste properties" commands don't update the target layer's name when you replace an image fill.


This plugin solves that problem. It copies the image fill and the layer name from your source layer. When you paste it onto a target layer, it not only replaces the image fill, but also updates the target layer's name to match the source layer's name.


Cleanup of Layer Names


When you import a single image into Figma, it appends " 1" (a space followed by a 1) to the layer name (e.g., "my-image 1"). This plugin will automatically remove this " 1" when it updates the target layer's name, keeping your layer names cleaner.


Note on Naming Conventions


This plugin updates the target layer's name to match the source layer's name. If your source layer is already named after the original image file, then your target layer will also match that file name.


However, if the source layer's name isn't the original image file name, then neither layer will reflect the original image file name. While the original image file name is accessible in Figma's CSS code and Dev Mode, Figma plugins currently cannot access this information directly. This means the plugin relies on your source layer having the desired name.


Keyboard Shortcuts


To make this more efficient, try adding a custom keyboard shortcut for this plugin’s 2 menu items. You’ll need to use the System Preferences of your computer. You'll add a shortcut for a specific menu item within the Figma application, allowing you to trigger the plugin with your chosen key combination.


Possible shortcuts:

Command-Option-Control-C for the “Copy Image Fill + Name” command

Command-Option-Control-V for the “Paste Image Fill + Name” command
plugins.tagline: Copy/Paste image fill plus its layer name

plugins.name: FigCopy-Node
plugins.description:
FigCopy-Node is a smart, bidirectional plugin for Figma that bridges the gap between designers and developers.


With a single click, you can:


🎯 Extract clean, readable code from Figma layers, groups, or frames


🔄 Paste the code back into the plugin to recreate your design inside Figma


⚡ Boost your design-to-dev workflow with consistency and speed


Whether you're building components, iterating fast, or handing off to devs,FigCopy-Node keeps your design and code in sync—both ways.
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma designs to code and back—seamlessly. Design, copy, paste, regenerate.

Whether you're building components, iterating fast, or handing off to devs,FigCopy-Node keeps your design and code in sync—both ways.
